about_the_game:
One of set of each SP version card.

[INCLUDED]
- D-BT02/SP01 Dragonic Overlord
- D-BT02/SP02 Vairina Erger
- D-BT02/SP03 Crimson Igspeller
- D-BT02/SP04 Diabolos Jetbacker, Lenard
- D-BT02/SP05 Cardinal Draco, Alviderd
- D-BT02/SP06 Aurora Battle Princess, Perio Turquoise
- D-BT02/SP07 Heavenly Bow of Edifying Guidance, Refuerzos
- D-BT02/SP08 Phantom Blaster Dragon
- D-BT02/SP09 Sylvan Horned Beast, Damainaru
- D-BT02/SP10 Rogue Headhunter
- D-BT02/SP11 Blaze Fist Monk, Damari
- D-BT02/SP12 Stealth Dragon, Togachirashi
- D-BT02/SP13 Dragritter, Iduriss
- D-BT02/SP14 Cleave Muddler
- D-BT02/SP15 Legio Wildmaster, Darius
- D-BT02/SP16 Diabolos Madonna, Mabel
- D-BT02/SP17 Aurora Battle Princess, Derii Violet
- D-BT02/SP18 Cardinal Noid, Thumborino
- D-BT02/SP19 Ravenous Monster, Marunorm
- D-BT02/SP20 Soaring Dragon, Prideful Dragon
- D-BT02/SP21 Sterilize Angel
- D-BT02/SP22 Diaglass Sorceress
- D-BT02/SP23 Maiden of Deep Impression, Urjula
- D-BT02/SP24 Regurgitation from the Underworld
- D-BT02/SP25 Wild Intelligence
- D-BT02/SP26 Blaze Maiden, Parama
- D-BT02/SP27 Diabolos Girls, Natalia
- D-BT02/SP28 Cardinal Draco, Enpyro
- D-BT02/SP29 Bard of Heavenly Song, Alpacc
- D-BT02/SP30 Frenzied Heiress
- D-BT02/SP31 Dragon Knight, Nehalem
- D-BT02/SP32 Berserk Dragon
- D-BT02/SP33 Dragon Monk, Gojo
- D-BT02/SP34 Embodiment of Armor, Bahr
- D-BT02/SP35 Lizard Runner, Undeux
- D-BT02/SP36 Darkness Maiden, Macha
- D-BT02/SP37 Blaster Dark
- D-BT02/SP38 Blaster Javelin
- D-BT02/SP39 Black Sage, Charon
- D-BT02/SP40 Fullbau

**If you already own the maximum number of cards allowed in-game that are also included in this set, you will receive a worthy amount of CP (in-game material for card crafting) instead.
**This set is also included in the "Rare Card Set 01 - 09".
**It is possible to purchase both individual Rare Card Sets and the bundle, but the acquisition of SP cards will only be reflected once.
**Please be careful not to purchases a Rare Card Sets twice.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
